attributes.action: call a general election due to the dishonesty in the present goverments members.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in light of all the dishonesty that has come to light in the last 2 yrs.
a general election should be called and get rid of all these people that abuse the system and abuse us that pay their wages.they should be made acountable for their actions and promises made and not kept.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
